mean_cn: n. 麻袋布（等于sackcloth）；  v. 解雇（sack的ing形式），装进，获得
mean_en: coarse fabric used for bags or sacks
word_etyma: sack麻布袋+ing与...有关之物 →麻袋布
short_phrase: a small cat in a sacking
sentence: Our kitten likes this coarse sacking because he can exercise his claws on it.
sentence_trans: 我们的小猫咪喜欢这个粗糙的麻布袋，因为他可以在上面活动爪子。
